channel.title: Training zone [Pi based]
channel.description:
ok so im testing this training zone that i put into my server coded by me but when you kill one of the NPC you dont get any XP. if anyone can tell me how to make it where they give XP to you can you help me
does anyone know how to add EP to a NPC you kill so that the player gets the XP so he/she can level
